channel.title: Fear valley on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Fear valley on Chaotic Online

item.title: Allmageddon
item.description: In this episode we’ll know the story of Hoton, a Creature that, seeking for an ancient power to protect everything and everyone he loved, ended up losing everything.

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see an elite squad led by Chaor in a bold raid on Kiru City towards the Overworld Arsenal

item.title: Crash Course
item.description: In this episode, Kaz faces Klay in a dispute while Tom tries to get the scan of a lunatic Creature whose life is playing tricks.

item.title: Dual Duel (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Krystella and Klay up to no good (again), resulting in an interesting dual battle for the scan of a wicked Battlegear.

item.title: Fighting Friendly (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode… the end! Of the season, of a promising career and of a long time friendship…

item.title: Fire Fighters
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a hot fight, literally, in which both players will try to prove their own superiority as well as of one of of the Four Elements.

item.title: Perithon!
item.description: In this episode, after an intense battle and glorious victory over the M’arrillians, the Tribes decide to keep Tribal Alliance towards a prosperous Perim and, to celebrate the peace, they make a car race… but old habits die hard…

item.title: Takinom
item.description: Takinom is an UnderWorld Commander who serves Chaor as one of his Counselors, along with Agitos.

item.title: Tale of Two Toms
item.description: In this episode an easy-going version of our protagonist comes into play and, thanks to an evil pushing, ends up in a fight, in the best Chaotic style

item.title: War Beasts
item.description: In this episode, after a while without mess with other players, Krystella and Klay set up for Peyton to get the scan of a War Beast, a humongous Mipedian titan as powerful as lunatic and, apparently, uncontrollable
